sentences.en: Don't wobble the desk when I'm writing.
sentences.cn: 我写字时你不要摇动桌子.

sentences.en: Even a small wobble will hurt its banks, which have roughly $120 billion in outstanding property loans.
sentences.cn: 哪怕稍有波动也会殃及其银行，各银行有大约1,200亿美元未偿房贷。

sentences.en: Even your old uncle Mally's paws wobble a bit from time to time.
sentences.cn: 就连你老叔叔我马力有时候都是哆哆嗦嗦的.

sentences.en: I have a good pair of skates, but no matter how tightly I lace them, my ankles wobble.
sentences.cn: 我有一双不错的溜冰鞋，可是不管我把鞋带系得多紧，脚脖子那里还是空落落的。

sentences.en: In addition to thellos tilt, there is the daily Earth wobble.
sentences.cn: 除了这种倾斜外, 地球每天都有抖动.

sentences.en: In addition to this tilt, there is the daily Earth wobble.
sentences.cn: 除开这种倾侧外, 地球每天都有抖动.

sentences.en: In other cases, evidence leads to the conclusion that planets must be causing the wobble.
sentences.cn: 在另一些情况下, 由这些证据可得出行星必定要引起摆动的结论.

sentences.en: Per the Zetas, wobble is to blame, no question.
sentences.cn: 齐塔人说, 毫无疑问, 地球晃动应该为此承担责任.

sentences.en: Please don't wobble the desk ( about ) when I'm trying to write.
sentences.cn: 我写字时请不要摇晃桌子.

sentences.en: The coach began to wobble when some of his team selections provoked much baffled comment.
sentences.cn: 当一些队员的入选招致许多不解的非议时，教练开始动摇了。

sentences.en: The Earth wobble does several things to the N American continent.
sentences.cn: 地球的抖动对北美大陆有几个方面的影响.

sentences.en: The low notes have a rich roundness that make your ankles wobble.
sentences.cn: 低音的浓重能震动你的脚踝.

sentences.en: The pile of bricks wobbled and fell.
sentences.cn: 那堆砖摇摇晃晃地倒塌了。

sentences.en: The vibration isolation technology for a wobble plate engine is researched.
sentences.cn: 研究了斜盘发动机的隔振技术.

sentences.en: Tom stopped, wobbling from the weight of his load.
sentences.cn: 汤姆停下来，身上的东西压得他摇摇晃晃。

sentences.en: We might look for a tiny wobble in the position of a star.
sentences.cn: 我们也许会观察到恒星的位置微微地变动。

words.tran_cn: 不稳定的；摆动的；歪斜的
思想动摇的人；晃晃摇摇的人；不稳定的人

trans.tran_cn: 摇晃， 摇摆； 犹豫
trans.tran_en: to move unsteadily from side to side, or make something do this
